mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, p.grade, p.schoolCardId, ic.id as cardid, ic.money as cardmoney FROM person p LEFT JOIN idcard ic ON p.schoolCardId = ic.id WHERE p.id=#{id}
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.grade, p.schoolCardId, ic.id as cardid, ic.money as cardmoney FROM person p LEFT JOIN idcard ic ON p.schoolCardId = ic.id WHERE p.name=#{name}
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.grade, p.schoolCardId, ic.id as cardid, ic.money as cardmoney FROM person p LEFT JOIN idcard ic ON p.schoolCardId = ic.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person (id, name, grade, schoolCardId) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{grade}, #{schoolCardId})
